data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample PROVIPGL-171

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Fluvial-toniger Sand, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 25%, Moss cover 85%, Vegatation type: Bestand auf altem Uferwall des McKenzis, Film number: 805A
